title: Provides for an exemption requirement from registration for ATVs operated on lands owned by the owner or to which the owner has certain contractual rights
summary: Provides for an exemption requirement from registration for ATVs operated on lands owned by the owner or to which the owner has certain contractual rights when the ATV is not operated elsewhere in the state and no consideration is paid to the owner for operation.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          798

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sens.  YOUNG,  DeFRANCISCO,  MAZIARZ  --  read twice and
         ordered printed, and when printed to be committed to the Committee  on
         Transportation

       AN  ACT  to  amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to exempting
         certain ATVs from registration requirements

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subdivision 11 of section 2282 of the vehicle and traffic
    2  law is amended by adding a new paragraph (c) to read as follows:
    3    (C) ATVS OPERATED ON LANDS OWNED BY THE OWNER OF SUCH ATV, OR ON LANDS
    4  TO WHICH SUCH OWNER HAS A CONTRACTUAL RIGHT OTHER THAN AS A MEMBER OF  A
    5  CLUB OR ASSOCIATION PROVIDED (I) THE ATV IS NOT OPERATED ELSEWHERE WITH-
    6  IN  THE  STATE,  AND (II) NO CONSIDERATION, EITHER DIRECT OR INDIRECT IS
    7  PAID TO THE OWNER OF THE ATV WITH RESPECT TO SUCH OPERATION.
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred twentieth day after
    9  it shall have become a law; provided  that  the  commissioner  of  motor
   10  vehicles  is  authorized to promulgate any and all rules and regulations
   11  and take any other measures necessary  to  implement  this  act  on  its
   12  effective date on or before such date.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02622-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to exempting certain ATVs from registration requirements
